name: william
text: lyle has wicked technique on the can. probably from all those man-douches .

name: anzio
text: I actually fail to see much correlation between squatting your nuts into a bowl of vinegar and shitting with "technique". I imagine the latter as being for more... complicated.

name: alejandroadam
text: Exactly!

name: geysershitdick
text: japanese people are bad at typing?

name: cleave
text: keke (^_^)b

name: nigelchaos
text: A comment left by nigelchaos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by monstermovie, greenery, tttt2, king_of_pwns, NDCaesar, adonkon, aHatOfPig, Panserbjorne)

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Chetyre, kenthegod, fattypneumonia)

name: hollis
text: I do not want to know about Lyle's technique.

name: shmuckeles
text: Haha! Lyle caught him there with that webcam bit

name: yingkaixing
text:
Lyle was channeling Walter Sobchak from The Big Lebowski.

They're going to kill that poor woman!

name: wazza
text: I can get you a toe.

name: patkun
text: Lyle is the voice of common sense.

name: riazm
text:
Someone was once telling an anecdote about window cleaners saw them "on the can" (long story) and I thought I'd throw this little "Can watch me all they want, I got technique" line in.

Do not do this unless you want people to think that you like it when window cleaners watch you shit.

name: natashamarie
text: I've had one too many experiences with window cleaners being at my mom's house when I was in various uncomfortable situations.

name: valrus
text: Yeah quoting Lyle is probably a bad idea in general in polite company.

name: zedpower
text:
(that's not what I think at all)
No, I---

(he's got it all wrong)
no, man!

(he can't be thinking about what I'm thinking he's thinking about)
No!

(oh crap he is)
Jesus, Lyle!

name: darthemed
text: Lyle looks genuinely worried in panel 8.

name: c_dizzle
text: toilet cams are cause for concern...when you want to be filmed. ...?

name: fineoakstructure
text: Actually, I always thought he was being a wise-ass, but with a faux sincerity, as opposed to blatant sarcasm...which gets Ray a little peeved, as it often does (since he normally falls for it for about 2 seconds).  Beef and Teodor seem do this with Ray, as well.

name: riazm
text: Well I always thought he was surprised that Ray thought that it'd come to toilet cams, like he had more information that he wasn't revealing.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: "What, asshole?"

name: helloftubby
text: lyle is in no position to criticise anybodys typing skills.

name: woodenteeth
text: but wait... check out his soberly typed Harry Potter Fan Fiction! I still submit that Lyle is a genius alcoholic writer riding the rough end fraction of his career.

name: epicurus
text: Lyle has a cool head about this whole situation.

name: presterjohn
text: Lyle is the kind of man who will work on office machinery with an automotive wrench.

name: cherubrocker22
text: Little Known Fact #173: The only tool needed to convert a letter-folder into a joint-roller is a common household wrench.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: I had to go to the mall for a while

name: spinynorman
text: This one is a favorite.

name: carlyle
text: All of those made me shudder.

name: direhaggis
text:
Each vertical set of panels showcases the same character or characters in this strip (the 1st panel being the set-up):

1st vertical set of panels - Ray.

Second vertical set - Lyle.

Third vertical set - Ray.

Fourth set - Both.

I thought it was a neat visual effect anyway.

name: relaxing
text: chubby for being more observant than i.

name: mattylite
text: Holy shit

name: puguglypress
text: Exactly.

name: woodenteeth
text: Take note Assetbarrians, this is the kind of minutae that is actually kinda interesting to point out.

name: gunsofray
text: Raymond almost had it.

name: carlyle
text: Ray is defenitely not afraid of any rival drug-dealers right now!

name: taskmaster
text: Lets face it- Ray is hella grasping at straws here.
